level.text: A violation of this chapter shall be subject to:

The fines and penalties set forth in § 825 or a section of this chapter; provided, that where a specific fine or penalty is not listed in § 825 or this chapter, the fine shall be one hundred dollars ($100);

Impoundment of the vehicle pursuant to the provisions of the Taxicab and Passenger Vehicle for Hire Impoundment Act of 1992, effective March 16, 1993 (D.C. Law 9-199; D.C. Official Code § 50-331) (2009 Repl. & 2011 Supp.);
License suspension, revocation, or non-renewal; or
Any combination of the sanctions listed in this subsection.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: 14 DCRR §450.1, Special Edition (January 10, 1975); as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 9847, 9851 (November 18, 2011).
